response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product, which I believe could be equally valuable to you, comes with a rich history and exceptional qualities that make it stand out in its category. I am offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $750,000, hoping that it aligns well with your interests and budget. Should you decide to proceed, I assure you of a seamless transaction and excellent customer service. If you have any questions or need more information about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
